DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate efficacy safety external physical vibration lithecbole ( EPVL ) treatment ESWL treatment stone discharged，thereby improve extracorporeal shockwave lithotripsy ( ESWL ) stone clearance rate . Investigators multi-centers randomize control trial ( RCT ) ，and investigator plan perform study 10 hospitals，which First Affiliated Hospital Guangzhou Medical University China , Department Urology , The Second Affiliated Hospital Zhengzhou University China , Jiangsu Province Hospital , Hubei Province Hospital , Zhongshan Hospital , Tongji Hospital , Hubei provincial people 's Hospital , Guilin 181 Hospital，the People ' Hospital Huzhou，The People ' Hospital Shaoyang . Investigators plan begin study August 2015 end July 2016 . One hundred eighty patient ESWL postoperative residual stone enrol study . By simple random sampling technique , patient assign segment natural stone row group physical row stone group , compare two group patient stone clearance rate complication , Investigators hope test , improve stone clearance rate ESWL . Number : 180cases ( 90 case control group , 90 case EPVL group ) Grouping method : In trial , investigator use equilibrium randomization method generate random numerical code table , accord table , patient randomly assign different group . Evaluating indicator Stone-free rate 4 week ESWL . Incidence rate complication adverse reaction EPVL ( fever , hematuria , etc ) . Trial method : Examination ESWL : blood routine , urine routine , renal function ( Cre , BUN ) , coagulation function ; intravenous pyelography ( IVP ) CT ( radiolucent calculus ) . ESWL Record : duration , frequency , voltage , time . Method control group ( group1 ) : ESWL without EPVL ; Reexamined abdominal plain film ( KUB ) CT ( radiolucent calculus ) right ESWL ; After leave hospital ( without drug ) , patient follow measure bellow : 1. amount fluid intake 2000ml/d 2. increase physical activity 3. rest position uninjured side , patient low renal calyx calculus need invert body .
